* Zyber stood on the edge of a cliff, she looked out onto the summer plains 
and sighed. It wasn't the cold wasteland of snow and ice that she was 
normally use to but the lack of prey had drove her to hunt in the warmer 
climates.
She climbed down from the rock outlook and trotted out into the long 
grasses, there was prey near by and she could smell it!
Zyber put her snout to the ground and began to follow the scent of wild 
game, it didn't take her long to find a herd of gazelle that suited her 
liking.
She crouched down in the long grass and strained her muscles to get ready 
and run, she knew that these herbavor were fast!
Zyber was just about to pounce when she heard it...music.
He straightened up and looked around, it wasn't long until she saw what had 
caused that lovely music...a bot!
She looked at the bot with her ears erect and forward, completely visible in 
the long grass.
The gazelle saw the predator in the long grass and galloped away, leaving 
the white wolf to stare in the other direction.*
